name: Butterfly Evolution
description:
A cute caterpillar/butterfly game made in 9 days for Go Godot Jam 3.

Evolve your butterfly's color.
Full controller support.

Controls

ActionKeyboard / MouseControllerMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft Analog
Lift Caterpillar's head
SpaceA / X
Fly in front of branches
SpaceA / X
EatEB / Circle
MateEB / Circle
Transform ( Caterpillar <-> Butterfly)
QY / Triangle
ZoomR -T / + - / Scroll Up - Down
R1 - L1

Tutorial
